body:
Even though it is not directly related to Radiance,
this announcement may be of interest to some list subscribers:

Post-Doctoral Fellow Position in Daylighting and Perception
at the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology Lausanne
See details at:
http://www5.epfl.ch/emplois/page27316.html
subject: [Radiance-general] Post-Doctoral Fellow Position in Daylighting andPerception at the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology Lausanne
